Articles.Content:
Though this may not technically be my first post- I've been a long-time lurker and even longer time player (started in 0.8 I think).

Mission objectives are as follows:

1. make funnies

2. help the Kerbal kind (of the forums at least- the others tend to have uncontrollable PTSD which I cannot confirm nor deny the cause of)

3. entertain people with my various wastes of time in KSP

Btw, if you happen to have a spare Dualshock 4 controller and a usb cable lying around and want to use it for KSP, I may be able to help you provided I have the spare time.

Hello and welcome to the KSP forums!

Oddly enough, you actually posted this thread on my birthday - but put that aside and Welcome anyway (I can help with some questions you may have).

Have fun and enjoy your stay!
